text:
Bronisław Chromy (June 3, 1925 – October 4, 2017) was a Polish sculptor, painter, and a professor at the Academy of Fine Arts in Cracow. Chromy was a member of the Polish Academy of Learning. He was born at Leńcze near Lanckorona.
Chromy died in Kraków, Poland on October 4, 2017 at the age of 92.

annotations.surface_form: Academy of Fine Arts in Cracow
